actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-432, by Ms. Pryce.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 171.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question on the amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 179 (Roll no. 878).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 186 (Roll no. 879).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Authorizing the Speaker to declare recesses subject to the call of the Chair from December 23, 1995 through December 27, 1995.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to declare recesses subject to the call of the Chair on the following dates: (1) December 23 through 27, 1995; (2) December 28 through 30, 1995; and (3) after the House has been in session on December 30, 1995, from such date through January 3, 1996. Prohibits the recesses from extending beyond, respectively: (1) December 27, 1995; (2) December 30, 1995; and (3) 11:55 a.m. on January 3, 1996.

titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to declare recesses subject to the call of the Chair from December 23, 1995 through December 27, 1995.
